ygData.subject: The Image
ygData.msgSnippet: Vulois was in a deep dream. He dreampt he was at The Oracle again, being thanked for his great work. Than the Oracle begna to laugh. Vulois was confused.

Vulois' was in a deep dream. He dreampt he was at The Oracle again, 
being thanked for his great work. Than the Oracle begna to laugh. 
Vulois was confused. Suddenly faces went onto the Oracle. Even though 
he had not ever seen these people in his life, he knew all of their 
names. Gotron, Perndabot, Reptillica, Bloodystrike, Stranato, 
Wheeljack, Unitron. Than one final face, the face he recognized. The 
face of the man who killed his closest and longest friend on this 
planet, Soundwave. It was Zardus.

Than suddenly, Vulois could not move. He had been chained up. He 
tried to fight his way out, but it just became stronger. Zardus(This 
isn't the real Zardus, it's just a dream, so it's not moding.) 
stepped out from the Oracle and stood infront of Vulois. Vuois tried 
to fight, but was stuck by the chains. Than Zardus began changing. 
And when the changes were done, Vulois was shocked by what he looked 
like.

Himself

Than the real Vulois went dormant, and this new Vulois took complete 
control. The eyes on the body opened, and he spoke.

"Alliance member Vulois, reporting for duty."
